----- Original Message ----From: Frank Sumptio=
n <franks-boxes@...>To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comSent: Thursday, Octo=
ber 25, 2007 1:41:23 PMSubject: RE: [EVP-ITC] No evidence is accptable!?


=










"As with the sound system, this TV one works by introducing rando=
mness.  Introducing randomness makes it difficult to judge if something hap=
pens just by pure chance or not.
 
I looked at your photos but I=92m afraid=
 I couldn=92t make much out on them (just what I saw =96 I=92m not claiming=
 my vision is better than anyone else=92s!). I looked closely at the pictur=
es in some photo software and noticed that they are very low resolution. It=
 is easy to see the actual pixels in the photos. This means that it is diff=
icult to pick out detail because some of it may be spurious ie. caused by t=
he edges of pixels rather than light. How are you taking the photos? Is the=
re any way you can use a higher resolution?"
 
 
 
 
 I don't know, sounds =
almost like double speak to me. 
 
 Frank-S
 
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups .comF=
rom: franks-boxes@ hotmail.comDate: Thu, 25 Oct 2007 12:39:28 -0600Subject:=
 [EVP-ITC] No evidence is accptable!?


 I'm still talking to the guy in th=
e UK, he can't hear any of the voices sent, nor can he see any of the image=
s. I can't tell if he's honestly trying just be very critical about what he=
 accepts as evidence, or just flat denies everything, no matter what it is.=
 He claims to have been working in the paranormal for 30 years. I can't ima=
ge seeing the images and seeing nothing, you would have to at least see som=
ething of broadcast artifacts, there are images of somekind in the pix! I s=
uspect that maybe he is so affraid, and been beat up by the scientific comm=
unity that he's shut down all his native senses, not wanting to face the wr=
ath and ridicule of "real" science. At least subconciously he has to know t=
here's something, otherwsie spend so long working to discredit everything--=
 unless it pays good.  Frank-S
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups .comFrom: franks-box=
es@ hotmail.comDate: Wed, 24 Oct 2007 22:55:17 -0600Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] =
Some more manual sweep voices.


Yeah, very! And thanks, that gives me some=
 hope. That was from turning a radio dial by hand while recording, not inte=
nding to hit any whole words. What's the chances of picking up a blatent se=
xual cmment like that by tuning across the dial?"  For those that couldn't =
make sense out of it; "she wants a c--- ---in--her --butt...." followed by =
something about a woman. Maybe from a negative source, but that doesn't mea=
n they are any less capable of producing voices. They can also mimic thepir=
its we do want.  Frank-S
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .comFrom: piggsy@sbcglobal=
. netDate: Wed, 24 Oct 2007 17:50:12 -0500Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Some more =
manual sweep voices.



Ooops. I didn't mean to send an empty email. Frank,=
 I believe I heard the "disgusting" comment. Funny to some....embar- ass-in=
g to others!

ve to wonder if it's worth trying to share this stuff. Frank-S
